text:
Hi everyone!
I’m creating the application which main use case will be import/export contacts. I’ve already done with importing contacts using search endpoint, but I can’t find the way to get the associated company information as well like domain or company names for contacts. Can someone help me please?
What I exporting is this property set
    “properties”: [
        “email”,
        “hs_lead_status”,
        “firstname”,
        “lastname”,
        “company”,
        “website”,
        “associatedcompanyid”,
        “jobtitle”,
        “hs_additional_emails”,
        “HubSpot_owner_id”
    ],
But looks like “website” and “company” fields are not the same as associated company domain and name.
Thanks and have a good day!
thanks! turns out it did have to be an approved/listed app
